en_title: LC: Speech by SJ on Third Reading of Contracts (Rights of Third Parties) Bill
zh_title: 立法會：律政司司長動議三讀《合約（第三者權利）條例草案》發言全文

en: Following is the translation of a speech by the Secretary for Justice, Mr Rimsky Yuen, SC, to move the Third Reading of the Contracts (Rights of Third Parties) Bill at the Legislative Council meeting today (November 26):
The Contracts (Rights of Third Parties) Bill has passed through the Committee Stage with amendments. I move that this Bill be read the third time and do pass.
zh: 以下是律政司司長袁國強資深大律師今日（十一月二十六日）在立法會會議上，就《合約（第三者權利）條例草案》動議三讀的發言全文︰
《合約（第三者權利）條例草案》經修正後已通過全體委員會審議階段。我動議此《條例草案》予以三讀並通過。

en: Following is the translation of a speech by the Secretary for Justice, Mr Rimsky Yuen, SC, to move the Third Reading of the Contracts (Rights of Third Parties) Bill at the Legislative Council meeting today (November 26):
The Contracts (Rights of Third Parties) Bill has passed through the Committee Stage with amendments
I move that this Bill be read the third time and do pass.
zh: 以下是律政司司長袁國強資深大律師今日（十一月二十六日）在立法會會議上，就《合約（第三者權利）條例草案》動議三讀的發言全文︰
《合約（第三者權利）條例草案》經修正後已通過全體委員會審議階段
我動議此《條例草案》予以三讀並通過
